fields.description:
euca-describe-account-attributes fails when UFS is not on the CLC.

comments.body: From the error it looks like this is the same underlying issue as EUCA-10694 (4.1.1), if so it will be fixed when 4.1.1 is merged.
Marked as blocker because console totally fails after login as it tries to get account details. Need this sooner than later, pls!
[~dkavanagh], you can deploy with ufs and clc on the same host to work around this issue.
I'm trying to use a setup provided for me, but you're right.
